description.narrative: Manual for Sign Language Work (SLW). WHAT: The project produces manual for Sign Language Work within Development co-operation printed in English and Signed in video.WHY: Manual's goal is to raise awareness, empower, capacitate and equip Deaf people as righ t holders.HOW: Manual will include instruction for Sign Language work around the world, so the effectiveness can't be estimated prior it is published. However it's meaning is already significant as it documents the Sign Language work.PARTNER ORGANISATION: The project doesn't have in a traditional way implementing organization. Instead it is a co-production with multiple National Associations of the Deaf. World Federation of the Deaf (WFD) will be the party responsible for the spreading of the manual when it is published.
